creditline: Gift of Richard J. and Helen Lynch Cashman
description: off-white bowl shaped hat; inner ring of rattan or bamboo with paper and gauze covered ring; long red tassel of twisted hair-like plant fibers beneath top finial; white stone finial with floral metal element at top center and openwork metal element beneath
markings: on underside, on sticker: [A / RATTAN HAT]
medium: Plant fibers, metal, stone, paper, gauze
title: Hat
